FuncDef:
The if-match tag command sets a filtering rule that is based on the route tag.
The undo if-match tag command cancels the configuration. The if-match tag command sets a filtering rule that is based on the route tag. The undo if-match tag command cancels the configuration. By default, no filtering rule based on the route tag is set.

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates the tag value.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 4294967295.

ExtraInfo: To filter routes based on the tags, run the if-match tag command.
